content.detailedDescription: 12:23 am facing s toward ocean, 2 orange/red orbs seeming to pulsate or flicker, hovering over tree line, moved toward each other and seemed to become one, then split, and gone in an instant.  this is not the first time seeing these objects. previous sightings witnessed by others (neighbors).  i am south of oak island, north of myrtle beach and wondering if they are military.
content.summary: 2 orange/red glowing orbs hovering, then moving toward each other, then gone in a blink toward south over ocean.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home sunday evening  in bozeman montana just after 10 pm traveling north on ferguson from babcock. i had been out visiting with my family for the evening. out of the corner of my eye in the north eastern sky, i noticed an arrangement of 4 to 5 orange lights hovering over the city at about 15,000 feet. at first i thought this may be fireworks as we are getting close to the 4th of july. i then realized they were slowly moving at about the pace of a cessna airplane and could not be fireworks. i pulled over on a side street and got out of my car to watch. i tried to capture video or a picture of the objects with my phones camera, but it was too dark for the camera on the phone. one by one, each light continued to move over the city toward the same spot in the sky, hold position for a moment, then they ascended toward the stars. after a few moments, their light slowly faded out. just as the last light was fading, i noticed another, single light, coming over the north east mountain range with the same color, size, and speed of the others. this light continued to the same spot in the sky as the previous ones, held it's position for a moment, then ascended to the stars and began to fade out. to my amazement, just as before, yet another appeared over the north eastern mountain range following the same path and procedure. this happened about 2 more times and then i did not notice any more lights. during this event, i did observe 2 airplanes fly over that area and were obviously aircraft due to their blinking navigation lights. the stars in the area were also starting to come out and were bright white and had no similarities to the orange lights. this entire event i was watching took about 10 minutes total. this event was certainly interesting and made me very excited to have seen something like this for myself.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange lights over bozeman mt

content.detailedDescription:
6-13-14  i saw a orbiting object for the second time at 5:04 am eastern sky, about 30 deg. up; traveling from sw to ne about 45 deg. east of polaris; sighting lasted about five seconds and then it disappeared; aspirin sized; possible international space vehicle or something similar.

this sighting was higher up and let me see an angle on the path that i didn't see .. n to s .. 6-10-14 figured on the first one at a much lower altitude.  

it has a frequency in this area and time in the sky of about three days and is about 15 degrees higher off the horizon on the second over the first. came about 10 seconds earlier than first .. again it just appeared and was moving and caught my eye. is this the international space station? it is up.
content.summary: Space station type .. large

content.detailedDescription: So on a nice calm night i stood out on the front deck and looked into the sky and i noticed a very huge amber colored orb object moving. i ran inside to find my camera  to tempt to record (but failed because the video was set at black and white mode and also very fuzzy). not long after i saw a huge red orb object lower altitude then the amber orb. they were flying together and going at the same pace. i then decided to try and follow the objects and when i got the the next block. i did not see these objects any longer (it was as if they disappeared. i had my camera handy and set to a better mode just in-case i would have seen them again. i then walked to the park in the direction they were headed. waited for 10 mins and nothing was visible. so i stayed outside for about an hour and decided to come inside.
content.summary: Two orb objects red/amber

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard, hearing the car alarm go off. i could see the 1st one come from the east behind a house, seem to hover then angle down to the ne, and out of sight no noise or flashing lights, just bright red. a helicopter. then a 2nd object also bright red came from behind the house, no noise or flashing lights, it seem to hover and went to the ne, as it went it became dimmer and was gone then came back still dim 2 more times, then it was gone.
both objects were bright red no noise or flashing lights, close enough to where i should have heard something. 1st object angled down ward behind some trees. 2 nd object  took off to the ne and became dimmer intill it was gone. i would say it lasted about 5 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Car alarm going off went outside in back yard, seen a bright red object moving n.W, hovers then drop down at a angle to the north . 2nd object came from same area bright red both did not have flashing light, object hovered then went nw and became dim, wen

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette, it was nighttime. i always sit outside and look at the stars, and i always see them, i never take pictures cause i had never intended to tell anyone. but that night was strange. i was just sitting in my chair outside and i got a flash in my head of 3 grey aliens! i actually saw them in my mind. like i was watching tv. that is how clear they were in my head. it was a quick flash but i had enough time to describe them. and that was that. i must say though they had kindness about them and i could tell they were small. i can still see them in my head. i am writing this to see why this happened. also, i have had strange occurrences as a child too. i will tell you about that time too. i have never told anybody this. i woke up in my bed, didn't remember going to bed. but as i opened my eyes i seen a red light leaving through my window, i remember sitting up in my bed but don't remember anything after that.
content.summary: Sitting outside smoking looked up and the were all flying in same direction

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving on west sylvania avenue by the mall going to an appointment, i noticed a very bright cloud like structure in the sky. it was not close to any other clouds at the time. it disappeared and reappeared in the same place twice during the time i was watching it.  the third time it disappeared, it did not return. it almost looked like the sun was shining through it although the sun was not in that area.
content.summary: Cloud-like structure  in sky with shining bright light, brighter than the fkyew clounds in the sh

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a break outside of my work and noticed a single cloud in a cloudless sky south of me. i watched this cloud quickly disperse within a minute or two. i then noticed a small cloud ne of me that i had not seen minutes before and thought it was odd that i missed it. after about a minute, i glanced at the area that i had seen the first cloud and was stunned to see another small cloud in the same spot as the first one. i watched it for a moment wondering how it formed so quickly and then i pulled my key chain video camera out and started recording. i took a little over 6 minutes of video that shows these clouds forming and then dispersing before i had to return to work. at one point it looked like these clouds were forming near small white dots but it was difficult to tell for certain. the videos show small white floating flying in front of the camera that are just cottonwood seed blowing in the breeze. i have not idea if this is a strange weather event or not. i hope someone can tell me after viewing the videos what it was. please note that the date stamps on the files are incorrect.
content.summary: 2 small clouds formed and dispersed at least 4 times within 12 minutes and no other clouds were in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw it first in second story window across lake. thought it was an idiot  flying low with brights on. came done stairs turned coffee on, got a jacket, got a cigarette and went on screened porch. seen the crisp white light over the shore line in the back yard of my house. thought what is this idiot doing, then heard no sound, i thought no this can't be. 3 crisp white light in triangle form, one red-orange in the center. slow about 35-40 mph. any lower i might be going for a ride. camera about 10 feet away, thought if i had flash on i'm not flashing at this thing. as it went in front of my home i only looked out front window, not going out there by myself.
flowed of to the southwest. weird.
i have never been the same. damn government , totally been lying and secret . if this was theirs were in deep trouble too.
ps: tried to see the structure, lights so bright could not see the vehicle, i'd tried, must have been very black.
content.summary: Belgium like triangle over lake then neighbors house

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were returning to work from lunch in laguna niguel, ca, and we observed a very fast moving object leaving a very distinct smoke trail traveling accross our line of sight at about 60 degrees above the horizon. the speed the object moved caught our attention and we watched it and could see it reflect light at one point, but we could not see wings or any lights or markings. the reflection suggested the object was bullet shaped -we assumed it was a military jet or something similar because of the very fast speed it was moving - much faster than a passenger jet, which are extremely common in the skies above where we work. just after the point it passed closest to us and began flying away from our point of reference, the object disappeared and the trail came to an abrupt end. although the object was no longer visible and the smoke trail came to an abrupt halt, the remaining trail was still clearly visible and intact along the path the object had traveled prior to disappearing. i took 2 pictures with my cell phone which focus on the point the smoke trail ended. to clarify, there was not a "trailing off" of the smoke - it just stopped abruptly as if it had been severed, for lack of a better description. the object did not turn or land and the smoke trail remained in a perfectly straight line, from our vantage point. i would estimate the object to have been flying at about 20,000 feet. i am not able to load the pictures onto this computer, but the pictures are available and i can supply them upon request.
content.summary: Fast moving object leaving heavy smoke trail, abruptly disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
1.Friends and i were standing at the edge of a open farm field at dusk and spotted what we thought was a chopper shining a light onto ground but making no noise.
2.The object was shining a bright light and it was dark out.
3.A chopper
4.Like i said it was moving very slowly in the distance and stopping at times about 1/4 mile away then it got closer and closer.
5.Excited at first then curios and then a little scared.
6.The last thing i remember is we thought we saw a shooting star at the end and we all started making a wish(ages varied from 5yrs to 9 or 10yrs old.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Friends and i saw hovering object about 1/4 mi. w prjocted light on ground then moved toward us maybe obducted.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i have been camping on wesley island for the past three years. we always go around memorial day week end. we camp in tents. the past two trips i have seen this orange object at night but at a great distance over the st. lawrence river. the first time, two years ago it blinked out and appeared in different parts of the sky. then it appeared to fly north toward canada and when it disappeared i saw a large flash of white light. 
 
last year we went with some friends to the same camp site and saw the object again, it was traveling the same direction east to west on the canadian border the same orange color again. far away but the color was distinct in the very clear sky. both sightings were after 11 pm.
may 31 2014 my fiancee and i were at the same camp sight on the laurence river and we had just started to lay down on our cots in our tent. it was around 12-1 am.  it was a beautiful night and you could see out the top of the ten. there were large breaks in the tree's and the stars and night sky were visible to us. like the moon roof of a car. my fiance was reading and she calmly said" you are not going to believe this. it is back." i looked up and through a large break in the tree's i saw the round orange object slowly moving over us above the tree's. it was very clear and much bigger than i had seen in the past. a beautiful orange color. no sound. no pulsating. the size of a golf ball. it moved west to east directly over our camp site and i watched it for forty seconds through some breaks in the tree's.
we were both stunned but not uncomfortable. i have seen this twice before and similar dates in the exact same campsite.  this time though i had a very good luck and all i can say is that it was a round orange object. much bigger and much clearer than my previous encounters.
content.summary: We were in our tent and could see out the top. it was a very clear evenin and the orange objecy moved above the tree's

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard taking the dogs out to do their business. i heard the sound of a jet-aircraft approaching from behind me, above. i looked up directly above me, and saw a white reflective orb or disc type craft.

it seemed to stay in place for a moment until the aircraft caught up and was ahead of the ufo. as the aircraft moved in a west-north-west i saw more, and noticed that there was a second ufo that looked the same as the first one, tailing this craft from behind the jet aircraft, and equidistant to the other craft. the way they moved was synchronised in a way as they were both going the same way, following this craft at the same speed it seemed. they didn't make any noise, and the only noise that was being emitted was coming from the jet. i watched until i couldn't see them past the backyard trees.

the whole event lasted about a minute, between 11:46 and 11:47am
content.summary: 2 reflective spheroid or disc-like ufos following aircraft over langford

content.detailedDescription:
Arriving home in the evening, probably 11:30ish, i'm outside looking up into the sky. above the se skyline i see a thick blue streak from left to right. instantly my mind goes to work and question possibilities: shooting star, satellite, plane, helicopter, meteor shower, ufo!
certain, if i keep observing in the same direction there's a good chance it'll happen again. i didn't see the attracting blue streak again;what i see is a large white dot like object. flashing me!
what am i seeing? am i really witnessing a et craft? 
i pull out my phone and begin recording. the object is just above the treeline in my back yard. i've got a clear view at this. there's a crescent moon out and the night sky is fairly clear.
still not sure of what i've located is what i believe it to be i'm a bit excited. 
i track this object for ten minutes and thirty three seconds. 
during this time it appears to be making contact with me. or perhaps, contact in general. the object flashes multiple times. sometimes very short bursts. other times the flash is a bit longer. 
the object appears to be moving in the sky. nothing extravagant i'm thinking but at least i'm recording my proof. good enough for me.
well, the object starts doing different things. now it's coming in close. real close.
now, the single blip i've been seeing has made its way down from the firmament into a more familiar space. it's come into my realm of existence. my space. my back yard. literally, feet away from me.
it comes in as a glow of light. a single glow. next it takes a triangular transparent luminous entity carrying/dragging a tail if you will. almost like a comet tail. 
it comes in and appears to be intrigued by me. it appears to look at me and hat i'm doing and really zooms in, like focusing really hard at me, so that it finally recognizes what i'm doing.
it hides behind a tree, child like, as if to want to play. it hovers again, it very clearly makes it's way to within feet of me, turns itself into what very clearly appears to be a ufo/et craft. and flys away.
from past videos and pics i've seen i can say without doubt that what i have has never been seen before. ever! not at this magnitude.
people always talk about the one that got away. not this one. it's here. i've got it. you've got to see it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star like, triangular et haze, landed et disc shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
J�����tais a un ��tant de p��ch�� situe a quelque kilom��tre de sill�� le guillaume avec 5 amies nous ��tions venus p��cher la carpe.
ce qui ma fait voir l'objet c'est que je regarder le ciel en direction ouest nord.
rien de sp��cial juste incroyable pas de bruit et des pulsion de couleur bleu ma couleur pr��f��rer. je savait automatiquement que c'��tai les extraterrestres.
juste avant je penser a eux comme tr��s souvent.
content.summary: Heureux

content.detailedDescription: It as during the night, after midnight. i was asleep. i woke up but could not open my eyes. i could smell rain, and felt my legs/feet being set down. there was some sort of cloth covering me and i could feel the edge of it across my lower neck. a voice in my head, coming from my right, informed me that i could open my eyes by saying,"now you can look." i became fearful, but turned my head to the left and opened my eyes. all i saw in a split second were two large almond shaped eyes. i felt an incredible amount of love, then i blanked out immediately and fell back asleep. when i woke up that morning, i found out it had rained during the night, and i did not have my window open due to it being january.
content.summary: Abducted. did not see a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were stargazing in hoopa california at 10pm 6/11/14. i pointed out a satellite to him when a second light sped up along side it slowed down to pace the first light. the first light pauses for a moment speeds up and stops in a jerky motion. second light speeds up and arcs into the clouds. i observe the first light moving across sky for awhile longer. both son and i observed a light earlier coming from the opposite direction moving across the sky in a slalom pattern assumed it was a satellite.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched a satellite cross the sky a second light sped along side. first light sped up then sat stationary for a moment. then juts forward with jerky pauses for a moment then takes off across the sky observable for a a little

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the highway and saw a large metallic sphere travelling from north to south.  no sound.  there were no aircraft in the area at the time.
content.summary: Saw a large metallic sphere travelling from north to south.  checked local air traffic and there were no aircraft in the area at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
I shot 5 frames toward the atlantic ocean because i was bracketing for a
commercial shoot of a house, the subject frame is the second # 136, i am sending you 3 frames, the first does not show any object in the sky, the time of the first frame # 135 time is 11:42:22, the second frame # 136 time is 11:42:28, the third frame time is 11:42;30 i didn't know of the object until
i edited the photos the same afternoon.

how is it possible for the object in the sky to vanish in 2 seconds? that is the interval between the frame 136 and 137.

i have many more sightings that i recorded in the past years all of them at night, never knowing that they were there until i edited them.

i omitted the street address of the house from which i shot the photos because it is not my residence and the owner wants to remain private.

all the frames are in a cf card at a much larger resolution, i reduced them
for the purpose of emailing.

best regards.

vano pecchio
content.summary: Oval object over the atlantic ocean

content.detailedDescription: My nephew called me around 9 pm on sunday the eighth to tell me that he was observing ufos revolving around each other.  i told him cool, but what are you talking to me for take pictures and videos.  his location is around three miles to the east of me so i called up to my wife to come down and bring the binoculars.  about ten minutes after he called we saw a white strobing light pass from east to west.  it looked like a plane until it appeared to back up then go down then go up.  my wife was looking through binoculars while i was attempting to video tape the event.  the first strobing light disappeared and then we noticed several other strobing lights to the east.  it was really hard to tell how many of them because they were moving around quite a bit then they would stay stationary.  i got to see one through binoculars and it was not only strobing white but blue and yellow as well.  i gave the binoculars back to my wife and attempted to film it again.  my iphone 4s then went dead for some reason.  i thought the battery was dead but when i plugged it in it came back to life with 30 percent power.  could be coincedence.  unfortunately, the lights were not bright enough for me to videotape.  after my phone died i noticed a plane heading straight for the strobing lights.  my wife said they just stopped when the plane got near.  meanwhile, my nephew had taken my advice and snapped a couple of pictures which clearly show triangular objects.  a couple of days later i was able to interview him and my son.  my ten year old was brief saying yeah we saw some weird lights in the sky one disappeared then they all dissappeared.  my 17 year old nephew however was very informative.  he said that there were originally three seperate craft circling around each other.  he also stated that they were very high up and that one disappeared before the others.  he was able to get a picture of two of the ufo's but did not realize that they were triangular until i enlarged it and sent it back to him. about 30 minutes after the event we noticed a helicopter with a search light in the area, but that could be another coincidence.  i put the original photos back in so you will have to enlarge it to see the three lights and triangle shape.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three triangle ufos observed by four witnesses three miles apart with pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Subject observed on a clear night off her balcony two orange glowing orbs at about 40 degrees over the ocean at arms reach they were aspirin size
they seemed to move horizontally and apart and together and then disappeared
they then reappeared and once again moved in the sky horizontally apart from each other and toward each other and then disappeared 
this happened five different times with the orange orbs moving in the same vicinity , but never the same places 
this lasted about forty minutes
no other planes or boats were in the vicinity and subject could hear no sounds
subject is absolutely sure these were not flares
subject provided latitude 33.93 and longitude 78.07 since this is an island
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Tuesday night while on balcony saw two orange orbs moving around in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to take my camera out onto the back deck and take pictures of the sky hoping i would pick something up that would be invisible to my eye but possibly show up on camera.
i set my camera to continuous shoot and just held it on my lap facing up to the sky. i then held down the button and it took a picture every second.
i came in and put the memory card into my computer and went through each pic.  i noticed a white circle on one and checked to see if it was on the picture before and the picture after and it wasn't.
i had sat very still and held the camera as it clicked away continuously.  it had to be something in the sky that was picked up in that split second as it wasn't anything i could see with my own eye.  obviously it was moving at a rate of speed that only a camera would pick up.
i am attaching 3 pictures that were taken in approximately 2 seconds. the one before the white circle, the one with the white circle and the one that came after the white circle.
i will also add 3 that are cropped to the show the area and 3 with circles around the area the dot was and one that is closely cropped.
for it to move that distance in 1 second it must have been going at great speeds.  i have no idea how to calculate this but i will try.
about 10 minutes earlier i watched a plane go by and i'm guessing it was going 500 mph.  it took quite a while for it to cover the area across my photo.  about 20 seconds is my guess, which would mean to cover that area in 1 second it would have to travel at a minimum speed of 10,000 mph. if it covered the expanse in 1/2 a second, well obviously that would be 20,000 mph.
all i know is my camera showed it there one second and not the next.
my feelings about this?  excited.
the last time i saw anything was in the late 70's and it was a distant bright circle that moved at great speeds and would stop on a dime and and then move a different direction.  i watched it for a few minutes before it disappeared.  it was quite amazing!  this current one, i didn't actually see with my own eyes, but it did show up on my camera.
content.summary: White circle high in the sky nee direction from my back deck in calgary alberta canada.

content.detailedDescription:
Subject was 13 in 1965 and was staying with grandparents in oak cliff texas
she woke up sick and 
felt she had been abducted and had been gone an hour
she vomited a strange chemical smelling substance three times  
when she stood up she passed a large blood clot which was unusual for a child who had only had one or two periods previously 
she hemorrhaged for five and six hours but her grandmother did not take her to the doctor
she felt weak  after the experience and felt different and knew she could never give birth to a child 

when the subject was in her twenties she noticed a chip in her sore right shoulder the doctor said it was unidentified and she has the xray 

she doesn't think she she was abducted again but not sure
she is now 61 
subject has heard of other abductions in that area in that time period and would like to talk to someone about getting more information about abductions and what happened in oak cliff texas in the 60's
content.summary: Was abducted as a 13 year old child in 1965 in oak cliff, tx.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking my dogs with a friend. clear skys.
a red light appeared low on the horizon and being a skywatcher my entire life it grabbed my attention as it appeared out of no where and then vanished at about 170degrees south west. at first before assessing the situation i thought it might be a plane but realized it had no blinking lights and there was no cloud coverage for it to disappear in. my friend was looking in the same direction also but had missed it the first time. i asked if he had seen it and he replied no. then just about 10 sec. or so later it reappeared as i described to him and we both saw it this time at about 130degrees sw. then we started noticing randomly blinking lights just above where we had seen the pill sized dull red light but at about 121degrees sw and slightly higher in elevation and much smaller lights like sparks, but not. eventually the phenomena dissipated. i had the same sense of knowing that there was an intelligence present as i did when i saw one in 2012 a white bluish orb over my house in new jersey around june 6-9 2012.  this contact was almost exactly 2 years later.
content.summary: Walking my dog with a friend and both of us witnessed something in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
1)finishing-up working on my next door neighbor's truck in the front yard & saying our goodnights.

2) my neighbor who was facing me said: "whoa -there's a purple beam on the hill!" at which point, myself and roomate turned to look.

3) a solid purple beam of light projecting down at approximately 30 degrees onto the adjacient foothill terminating in a spotlight fashion on said hill with an approximate diameter of 30'-100' based on our approximate distance of .25 miles.

4) i did not see any object -only a solid violet beam. my neighbor saw it first, then my roomate and i turned to see this beam flash on the hill for about 2 seconds. then, we move our position to my front yard (towards hill) to get a better view. 20-30 seconds later, we saw it project another beam upwards -but in the same direction.

5) well, we were pretty blown away considering the fact that the beam on the hill was being projected from the sky, which led us to believe that there must've been some type of aerial platform from whence it was projected. also, it was too intense and large to possibly be any kind hand-held laser. this was big! my guess is that this laser could be equated to a laser-type instrumet operating in the thousands of wattage range -which means it had to be big.

6) all we saw was a beam -no object projecting it. we could not discern it's origin.
content.summary: 3 of us were out front talking when my neighbor noticed an intense violet solid light beam projecting a spot on the foothills 2x

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and when i almost got home i saw an object hovering above a bridge off i-20. it would get very bright then fade out and the light would almost disappear then it would get bright again. the object was a glowing yellow at first then the closer i got, the more details i could see. i witnessed the object hover and i clearly saw a triangle almost crescent like object hovering with yellow lights surronding the exterior getting brighter and fading. the object hovered and then slowly descended behind a row of trees and it was out of my sight. it was like nothing i've ever seen before and it left me with chills and my heart racing after the incident.
content.summary: The object was hovering above the trees then descended south east

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were. at the sports festival in north brunswick,10 minutes after the fireworks. started to the west,i randomly turned around to notice a close to baseball shape moving very quickly through the sky.I said to my daughter."look,what the heck is that"? she said its definitely. not a airplane,or helicopter,or balloon.Its altitude  was in between a jet and helicopter.It was visible for about 15 go 20 seconds,but it was a large distance because we were in a open field off rt 1...I can understand why maybe no one at the fair seen it as the fireworks were going off but someone in the county had to see this strange object..
content.summary: randomly turned behind us and seen a roundish object fairly low,quiet,showed daughter.Scary.

content.detailedDescription: It was too high to be a balloon / weather balloons don't come into neighborhoods like mine. wasn't any known military aircraft. not a passenger jet . it was moving and changing direction way to fast for it to be a aircraft we know about and when it .Left so fast we couldn't even see it. what we saw i deem it to be a ufo
content.summary: Object bobling around. every 2 min it would shoot out white flares that looked like lights. then after a few minutes it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was easter sunday we were outside for a walk when my grandson pointed to the sky and was excited, we were puzzled as to what it was, it didn't make any noise and didn't really move it was just sort of hanging there in the sky. we were excited to see something so different so took a picture of it were thinking maybe it was a satelite?  we told our friends and family and then kind of forgot about it, we were waiting for it to do something but it just moved away, we watched it until we couldn't see it any more.  it was pretty exciting.
content.summary: My greandson who loves airplanes saw it first and pointed it out to us.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for my cigarette before work and looked up to the sky and saw this object. i want to know what it was. no noise, it flashed randomly, it reflected off light, moved very quickly and straight down almost. as i was watching it i felt a bit uneasy so i just stoped recording and went back inside.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,N/A
content.summary: Just a day like all others, then i saw this.
